name: ArtilleryCraft
description:
The survivalists survive a plane crash to take their last stand one final time. Build, Shoot, and Dig your way to victory against your friends or with your friends as the creatures of the night lurk, and be sure not to die because that would be bad.

Host a game and hop on with some friends, you wont regret it!

How to Play:

Build with right click and Shoot with left click.

Press E to open your inventory and to craft weapons.

Press Escape to pause the game and configure Mouse Sensitivity and FOV.
